channel.title: About on Dr. Elliot
channel.description: Recent content in About on Dr. Elliot

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, and welcome to my blog! I’m an Unreal Engine developer with a strong focus on networking and gameplay systems. With over three years of experience working in the engine, I’ve honed my skills in C++ and C, crafting efficient and scalable solutions for real-time multiplayer experiences. Beyond development, I’m an avid gamer, deeply inspired by the intricate worlds and narratives of classics like Fallout 3 and Fallout: New Vegas. These games have shaped my understanding of immersive gameplay and the importance of robust systems.
